attributes.action: We would like for you to make sure that the phone companies give us unlimited texting or atleast a higher fair use policy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: So at the moment when we get a contract with unlimited texts they usually never mention the fair use policy they have, and their always ridiculously low for us teenagers and 3,000 or 4,000 sometimes doesn't cover it for us and when they say unlimited we think they should literally mean unlimited.
